shoot.text: the dragons goes up then knocks you off and you die

throw gun away.text: the dragon see's you throw the gun away so goes and lets you be

look.text: You look and see a gun  in your pocket

try tame.text: it continues acting weird and kills you

put.text: You put the saddle on Bobby. Bobby starts acting weird.

go.text: At the village you make a saddle it takes two months.

look.text: You look for a village you find one.

talk.text: You ask the dragon 'to go down please' but the dragon doesn't go down.

name.text: You name the dragon 'Bobby' and ask it to go down. Bobby goes down.

climb.text: You climb onto the dragon's neck and the dragon flies away but you can only just hold on.

look.text: You can see a big two headed dragon, with spikes all over it.

tame.text: You put your hand out and wait for the dragon to put it's nose on it. The dragon lowers it's right head.

pull.text: You pull on the rope the bucket falls on your head and you die!

climb.text: You climb the rope. You find yourself in a really big scary forest.

drop.text: you drop it and it lands on your foot then brakes it, then you get a big cut and die off blood loss

throw.text: The bucket lands outside the well. It was attached to some rope.

wear.text: You look very nice with a bucket on your head.

back.text: You go back through the door

open.text: You open the door and are in the bottom of a well
